text:
Could be that I was just a kid.
Could be that it was never explained.
Or it could be that it was explained and I just didn't get it.
But man, I didn't like actually PLAYING this game.

Though the music is nice at least.

Honestly, the best part of this game, for me, was the teaser video for Final Fantasy X-2 that came on the disc with it, lmao.

I remember playing it a long time ago, I still enjoyed it at the time when I was young. But it definetly didn't age well, I still play Romancing Saga from time to time.

text: This game has a great soundtrack by Hamauzu and I especially enjoy the DG tracks. This piano piece stands out, though I feel more melancholy and nostalgia than sadness. Strangely enough, the first Saga game released in more than a decade should be coming out this year for the... Vita.
